</CsInstruments> <CsScore> s i 1 0 3 512 1 ;original sound - ifftsize of pvsanal does not have any influence i 1 3 3 1024 1 ;even with different i 1 6 3 2048 1 ;settings
s i 1 0 3 512 1.5 ;but transformation - here a fifth higher i 1 3 3 1024 1.5 ;but with different settings i 1 6 3 2048 1.5 ;for ifftsize of pvsanal
